email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for an iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 150,000MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per ton. The laycan is 15-20 November. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can you revise the rate to USD 18.00? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
James Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I can offer USD 18.20 per ton, which is competitive given the vessel's specifications and the current market. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 18.20 is acceptable. Can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 November? Also, please confirm the loading rate at Port Hedland.

Best regards,
James Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

The laycan has been adjusted to 17-22 November. The loading rate at Port Hedland is 15,000MT per day. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Everything looks good. Please send the summary of terms for final confirmation.

Best regards,
James Carter

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 17-22 November
- Freight: USD 18.20 per ton
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF
- Loading Rate: 15,000MT per day

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Santos
